alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 12:51PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches with locally up to 12 inches over the southern Green Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Vermont, Western Windham and Bennington Counties. In New York, Eastern Rensselaer County. In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. * WHEN...Through 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. Gusty winds will cause blowing and drifting of snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour at times during the early to mid afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
